title: Paint the Night Fashion Show
text:
Five Star Talent and Productions Hosts Paint the Night Fashion Show for House of Gaia 501(c)3 FiveStarTalent 2:59 PM, Oct 21, 2015 
House of Gaia,a project of the nonprofit organization Bee Gaia’s mission is to foster a global perspective in order to promote a more peaceful, creative, and conscientious world. Bee Gaia’s programs achieve this mission by educating, connecting, and building community through Art, Culture, Well-being, Global-Citizenship, and Community Service. 
House of Gaia is a Community Learning Center located in Naples. Five Star Talent and Productions is hosting Paint the Night Fashion Show on November 6 at 8:00 in Marco's Bar and Grill 2624 Tamiami Trail E. Naples. The cost of admission is $15 for General Seating and $40 for VIP a portion of the proceeds will go toward continued growth and sustaining of House of Gaia programs and facility. 
Helen Gerro Art is Contemporary Paintings and Haute Couture Custom Made by Helen Gerro"Art Couture" Custom Couture each piece is an original the fashion becomes a wearable piece of art. 
Loki Designz mantra is ''Love Is Key" is displayed in his Hand-Painted Custom Clothing & Accessories/Unique one-of-a kind Art.
